name: Lysander the Forsworn
appearance: Roughly clad in tattered robes, with silver hair streaked gray by age and dust. A gnarled wooden staff rests against his shoulder.

stunts.name: Dragon Tongue
stunts.description: You can speak the ancient language of your draconic heritage, allowing you to decode forgotten texts and locate hidden locations.

stunts.name: Knowledge is Power
stunts.description: Whenever you convince someone using Persuasion, they must share something from their past—perhaps a fragment of knowledge or lore that could aid you in the future.

stunts.name: Arcane Agility
stunts.description: You can use your Arcana skill to quickly memorize spells or scrolls while traveling, allowing you to cast them without needing materials.

quirks: Finds solace in the company of ancient tomes
fears: Losing the very connection that made them seek this path
desires: Unlocking the lost secrets of the ancients

backstory.origin: Born into an esteemed scholarly lineage, Lysander was trained in both magic and philosophy. However, his pursuit of forbidden knowledge led to a tragic conflict that nearly destroyed everything he held dear.
backstory.formativeEvent: A failed ritual during which the ethereal spirits interfered, scattering fragments of powerful ancient lore across distant lands. This event forced him into exile and left him forever haunted by what might have been.
backstory.secret: He carries an incomplete tome—a key to unlocking a long-lost magical system that could change everything. Its final piece lies hidden in the ruins of his ancestral home, now lost to time.
backstory.summary: Now wandering the land as a scholar-mage, Lysander travels from library to library, searching for fragments of knowledge while grappling with the weight of his past.

voice.quirks: Prefers to speak in long, winding sentences that often leave listeners confused.
